name: DK Castle Explorer
description:
Castle Explorer is an educational video game by DK Multimedia, released in 1996 for Windows and Macintosh. It allows players to discover the innerworkings of a castle structure within a Medieval context. It is based upon the Incredible Cross-Sections: Castle book by illustrator Stephen Biesty and author Richard Platt.

The player is a page who is given the task of being a spy to enter the castle and gather information for the king.

(Source of Description - Wikipedia; 'Castle Explorer')
